Members can view team members.name: Members can view team members
Members can view team members.using: team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)

Admins can insert members.name: Admins can insert members
Admins can insert members.withCheck:
team_id IN (
            SELECT id FROM teams WHERE owner_id = auth.uid()::text
            UNION
            SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text AND team_level IN ('team_lead', 'senior')
        )

Admins can delete members.name: Admins can delete members
Admins can delete members.using:
team_id IN (
            SELECT id FROM teams WHERE owner_id = auth.uid()::text
            UNION
            SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text AND team_level IN ('team_lead', 'senior')
        )

Team members can view teams.name: Team members can view teams
Team members can view teams.using: id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text) OR owner_id = auth.uid()::text

Team members can create projects.withCheck: team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)

Team members can update projects.using: team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)

Team members can view files.name: Team members can view files
Team members can view files.using: team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)

Team members can upload files.name: Team members can upload files
Team members can upload files.withCheck: uploaded_by = auth.uid()::text AND team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)

Team members can view conversations.name: Team members can view conversations
Team members can view conversations.using: team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)

Team members can view events.name: Team members can view events
Team members can view events.using: team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)

Team members can create events.name: Team members can create events
Team members can create events.withCheck: created_by = auth.uid()::text AND team_id IN (SELECT team_id FROM team_members WHERE user_id = auth.uid()::text)
